TopicTitle: How to... change Patched Conics mode?

Articles.Content:
I have seen screenshots and vaguely recall a post I cannot seem to find on a special feature of Patched Conics. Apparently, you can edit a value in one of the games' files, and it'll change the "mode" patched conics runs in. Higher numbers made for some very... interesting... screenshots.

Anyhow, which file and what value is that?

Conics_Patch_Draw_Mode will change the way the orbits are draw. 3 and 1 are the only useful ones.

Conics_Patch_Limit will change how many orbits ahead it will predict. I highly recommend changing this to at least 3.
Bear in mind that accuracy is lost fairly quickly starting at about the third patch, so any more than that cannot be relied upon.
Skip to the 2.45 mark, he explains what each conics draw mode does.
